Greek
Kathe nychta pou chorevo
Se skies kai se skotadia akrovato
Mes t’ asteria se gyrevo
Kai sti mousiki tou dromou se zito
Na borousa na klepso to oneiro sou
Na chatho ston pyreto sou
Otan les to s’ agapo
Ki otan fevgeis choris skopo
Tosoi dromoi pligomenoi
Toses portes dichos anthropo kai fos
Kapou tha’ sai xechasmeni
Ki ap’ ton idio to diko sou eafto
Na borousa na klepso to oneiro sou
Na chatho ston pyreto sou
Otan les to s’ agapo
Ki otan fevgeis choris skopo
An boreis na oneirefteis
Ti mera pou charazeis ti siopi
Tote tha’ sai dynati
Ton ilio n’ antikryseis
Ma to xero tha dakryseis ma
Tha klepso to oneiro sou
Na chatho ston pyreto sou
Otan les to s’ agapo
Ki otan fevgeis choris skopo
